name: Adult Ballet
description: This class is designed for adult dancers of all abilities. Students will continue to strengthen their ballet technique with exercises and combinations aimed to improve alignment and balance, strengthen muscles, and increase flexibility. Prior ballet experience is recommended.
fullDescription: This class is designed for adult dancers of all abilities. Students will continue to strengthen their ballet technique with exercises and combinations aimed to improve alignment and balance, strengthen muscles, and increase flexibility. Prior ballet experience is recommended.
whatTheyOffer: This class is designed for adult dancers of all abilities. Students will continue to strengthen their ballet technique with exercises and combinations aimed to improve alignment and balance, strengthen muscles, and increase flexibility. Prior ballet experience is recommended.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: This is a fee based service.
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
